C

closeConnection() - Static method in class DAO.JDBC
closeConnection Closes the connection to mySQL database.
connection - Static variable in class DAO.JDBC
 
Contacts - Class in model
Contacts class is created for recording objects into tables/ComboBoxes
Contacts(int, String) - Constructor for class model.Contacts
Constructor used in ContactsDAO.getAllContactsById(int contactId)
Contacts(int, String, String) - Constructor for class model.Contacts
Constructor used in ContactsDAO.getAllContacts()
ContactsDAO - Class in DAO
ContactsDAO contains all ContactsDAO Methods to communicate with the MySQL database.
ContactsDAO() - Constructor for class DAO.ContactsDAO
 
Controller - package Controller
 
Countries - Class in model
Countries class is created for recording objects into tables/ComboBoxes
Countries(int, String) - Constructor for class model.Countries

Countries Constructor
CountriesDAO - Class in DAO
CountriesDAO contains all CountriesDAO Methods to communicate with the MySQL database.
CountriesDAO() - Constructor for class DAO.CountriesDAO
 
countryToDivision(int) - Static method in class DAO.First_Level_DivisionsDAO
countryToDivision(int countryId) is used in customerCreationFormController.onActionCountryPicker(ActionEvent) & customerModificationCountryPicker(ActionEvent) to fill a comboBox.
createAppointments(String, String, String, String, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, int, int, int) - Static method in class DAO.AppointmentsDAO
createAppointments() is used in appointmentCreationFormController.onActionCreateAppointment(ActionEvent) - Adds appointment to tableview
createConnection() - Static method in class DAO.JDBC
createConnection() was created as a shortcut to get connection
createCustomer(String, String, String, String, LocalDateTime, String, LocalDateTime, String, int) - Static method in class DAO.CustomersDAO
createCustomer() is used in customerCreationFormController.onActionSaveButton(ActionEvent) This creates a customer and adds them to the tableview
createCustomerValidation() - Method in class Controller.customerCreationFormController
createCustomerValidation() checks to make sure textFields, and ComboBoxes are not empty or Null
customerCreationFormController - Class in Controller
customerCreationFormController is used to create Customers
customerCreationFormController() - Constructor for class Controller.customerCreationFormController
 
customerMenuController - Class in Controller
customerMenuController is the Customer View List Form
customerMenuController() - Constructor for class Controller.customerMenuController
 
customerModificationFormController - Class in Controller
customerModificationFormController is used to modify selected Customers
customerModificationFormController() - Constructor for class Controller.customerModificationFormController
 
Customers - Class in model
Customers class is created for recording objects into tables/ComboBoxes
Customers(int, String) - Constructor for class model.Customers
Constructor used in CustomerDAO.getAllCustomersById(int)
Customers(int, String, String, String, String, LocalDateTime, String, LocalDateTime, String, int, int) - Constructor for class model.Customers
Constructor used in CustomersDao.getAllCustomers()
CustomersDAO - Class in DAO
CustomersDAO contains all Customers Methods to communicate with the MySQL database.
CustomersDAO() - Constructor for class DAO.CustomersDAO
 
customerSelection(int, Customers) - Method in class Controller.customerModificationFormController
customerSelection used in customerMenuController.onActionUpdateCustomer(ActionEvent) to get selected customer from tableview and put information into customerModificationFormController fields.
